name: Vampire Vs Ghosts
description:
A game created for the MashUp Game Jam 2022.

Ghosts have sprung up from the depths and now it is time to put them to rest and seal their entrances. Gather wooden planks to seal up the holes while battling the ones that have already come out. Each hole sealed increases their aggressiveness and toughness. Do you have what it takes?

Enjoy,

WizardWithAHat

Game Randomizer Theme:

Genre: Hack & Slash (The combat style)

Theme: Reflection (The ghost have reflection in water, you do not)

Setting: Pool (An basement and cave system with pools of water)

Item: Wood (The item needed to seal the holes)

Extra Theme: Halloween (ghosts and vampire).
